title: Variable aerosol.reffccwctop.tavg-u-hxy-ccl.mon.GLB (Emon.reffccwctop)
Comment: Cloud-Top Effective Radius of Liquid or Ice Cloud at Liquid or Ice Cloud Top
Long name: Cloud-Top Effective Radius of Liquid or Ice Cloud at Liquid or Ice Cloud Top

title: Variable aerosol.ccldncl.tavg-u-hxy-ccl.mon.GLB (Emon.ccldncl)
Cell methods: area: time: mean where convective_cloud (mean over the portion of the cell containing liquid topped cloud, as seen from top of atmosphere)
Comment: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Convective Cloud Tops
Long name: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Convective Cloud Tops

title: Variable aerosol.so2.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.so2)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface so2 volume mixing ration at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Surface SO2 volume mixing ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmrss.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmrss)
Comment: This variable represents instantaneous surface sea salt aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Sea salt Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmrso4.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmrso4)
Comment: This variable is for instantaneous surface mass mixing ratio of sulfate aerosol at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Instantaneous Aerosol Sulfate Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmroa.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmroa)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface organic aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours.
Long name: Instantaneous surface total organic aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmrno3.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmrno3)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface NO3 Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Instantaneous surface NO3 aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmrnh4.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmrnh4)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface NH4 Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Instantaneous surface NH4 aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmrdust.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmrdust)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface Dust Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Instantaneous surface Dust Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.mmrbc.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmrbc)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface elemental carbon Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours

title: Variable aerosol.mmraerh2o.tpt-h2m-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.mmraerh2o)
Comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface aerosol water Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Instantaneous surface aerosol water mass mixing ratio at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.conccn.tpt-u-hxys-u.3hr.GLB (E3hrPt.conccn)
Comment: The variable represents the instantaneous Aerosol Number Concentration at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
Long name: Sub-daily Aerosol Number Concentration at CF sites

title: Variable aerosol.rluscsaf.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.rluscsaf)
Comment: Flux corresponding to rluscs resulting from an aerosol-free call to radiation
Long name: Surface Upwelling Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation

title: Variable aerosol.hfc134a.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.hfc134a)
Comment: This is the mole fraction of HFC134a in air

title: Variable aerosol.hfc125.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.hfc125)
Comment: This is the mole fraction of HFC125 in air

title: Variable aerosol.hcfc22.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.hcfc22)
Comment: This is the mole fraction of HCFC22 in air

title: Variable aerosol.emibbvoc.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbvoc)
Comment: Total emission rate of non-methane volatile organic compounds (NMVOCs) from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission rate of NMVOC from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbso2.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbso2)
Comment: Total emission rate of SO2 into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic).
Long name: total emission rate of SO2 from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibboa.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibboa)
Comment: Total emission rate of particulate organic matter (organic aerosol) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission of organic aerosol from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbnox.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbnox)
Comment: Total emission rate of nitrogen oxides (NOx) from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission rate of NOx from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbnh3.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbnh3)
Comment: Total emission rate of ammonia (NH3) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission rate of NH3 from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbdms.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbdms)
Comment: Total emission rate of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission of DMS from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbco.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbco)
Comment: Total emission rate of carbon monoxide (CO) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission rate of CO from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbch4.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbch4)
Comment: Total emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission of CH4 from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.emibbbc.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.emibbbc)
Comment: Total emission rate of black carbon aerosol into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
Long name: total emission rate of black carbon aerosol mass from all biomass burning

title: Variable aerosol.dryno3.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.dryno3)
Comment: Loss rate of nitrate (NO3) aerosol from the atmosphere due to dry deposition

title: Variable aerosol.conccn.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.conccn)
Comment: This is the number concentration of air particles in air

title: Variable aerosol.cfc114.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.cfc114)
Comment: Mole fraction of cfc114 in air

title: Variable aerosol.ccn1.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.ccn1)
Comment: This is the concentration of cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) at 1.0 percent supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size

title: Variable aerosol.ccnp02.tavg-al-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.ccn02)
Comment: This is the concentration of cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) at 0.2% supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size

title: Variable aerosol.abs550ss.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.abs550ss)
Comment: This is the sea salt aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

title: Variable aerosol.abs550so4.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.abs550so4)
Comment: This is the sulphate aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

title: Variable aerosol.abs550oa.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.abs550oa)
Comment: This is the particular organic matter aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

title: Variable aerosol.abs550no3.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.abs550no3)
Comment: This is the nitrate aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

title: Variable aerosol.abs550dust.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.abs550dust)
Comment: This is the dust aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

title: Variable aerosol.abs550bc.tavg-u-hxy-u.mon.GLB (AERmon.abs550bc)
Comment: This is the black carbon aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

title: Variable aerosol.sfpm10.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.1hr.GLB (AERhr.sfpm10)
Comment: Hourly PM10 Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

title: Variable aerosol.sfpm1.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.1hr.GLB (AERhr.sfpm1)
Comment: Hourly PM1.0 Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

title: Variable aerosol.so2.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.so2)
Comment: Daily mean SO2 volume mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.sfpm25.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.sfpm25)
Comment: Daily mean PM2.5 mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.sfpm10.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.sfpm10)
Comment: Daily mean PM10 mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.sfpm1.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.sfpm1)
Comment: Daily mean PM1.0 mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrss.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrss)
Comment: Daily mean Sea Salt mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrsoa.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrsoa)
Comment: Daily mean secondary organic aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrso4.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrso4)
Comment: Daily mean sulfate aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmroa.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmroa)
Comment: Daily mean total organic aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrno3.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrno3)
Comment: Daily mean NO3 aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrnh4.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrnh4)
Comment: Daily mean NH4 mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrdust.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrdust)
Comment: Daily mean dust aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmrbc.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmrbc)
Comment: Daily mean elemental carbon mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.mmraerh2o.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.mmraerh2o)
Comment: Daily mean Aerosol water mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer
Long name: Daily mean surface Aerosol water mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

title: Variable aerosol.co.tavg-h2m-hxy-u.day.GLB (AERday.co)
Comment: This is the daily mean for CO volume mixing ratio in lowest model layer
